name: Jokenpo (PauloZago)
description:
Um jogo simples de pedra, papel e tesoura que fiz pra treinar.

A simple game of rock, paper and scissor that I made to training.

Credits

Fonts:

m6x11 by Daniel Linssen(@managore) - https://managore.itch.io/m6x11

quaver by Nathan Scott(@caffi_nate) - https://caffinate.itch.io/quaver

Arts:

Rock Paper Scissors Flat Icons by nightwolfdezines - https://www.vecteezy.com/vector-art/693097-rock-paper-scissors-flat-icons

Rest by Me
